website_summaries.verdict: Rugged looking case with super sticking strength. Optional mount to attach to bikes, strollers and more - for an additional purchase.
pros: Securely sticks to almost any metal surface
Made with industrial grade magnet that will not interfere with credit cards, Bluetooth, GPS or Wi-Fi
Can twist-lock to almost any object using mount, which must be purchased separately
Dual-layer design with reinforced corners to protect against drops
cons: While the case is strong, the glass may still break if dropped
A few reports of magnetic interference with gift cards and other devices

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and useful
customer_reviews.text: I’m in hvac and have many Bluetooth tools that utilize my phone as the screen. Being able to stick my phone to whatever I’m working on is amazing! Magnet on the case is so strong my keys stuck to the back of my pants as I was walking around not even knowing it
customer_reviews.author: JeffroBodein

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to press lock button or volume, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I voiced this review directly to the rokform website explaining my dislike and bad design of this case. I left a one star review there as well but it never was posted. I verified I purchased it from amazon and no response. So I am certain amazon will post my one star review here. Do not but this case! Poor design of volume and lock button. You have to press the side of the phone so hard in order lock your phone or turn up the volume. Say good bye to trying to take a screen shot of something as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Magnet will make compass not working on iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok product. It’s required for the Rokform bike mount so I had to get it. It feels bulky but acceptable. Harder to put phone in and out. The apple logo is in center so that’s good. The buttons are actually hard to press. Maybe they need to be breaking in. The most annoying part is the magnet. First of all compass will be rendered useless but gps will work. Second when try to click onto the mount the magnet is so strong that I always miss the joint. Maybe in the future I will take the magnet off.
customer_reviews.author: GeoZ

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat good.
customer_reviews.text: The case is built like a tank and looks great. But it’s a little too overbuilt. I can’t use the sleep/awake and volume buttons. The case is so sturdy and stiff it’s hard to tell if your pressing the buttons. But the biggest negative for me is that you can’t use the wireless charging function of your phone. The powerful magnet on the back of the case prevents you from it. Decent case for the price if you can live without wireless charging and hoping the case will break in a little and the buttons soften up some.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Longale

customer_reviews.title: solid case
customer_reviews.text: My last rokform case has lasted close to 3 years and is still great shape. I have just upgraded to a iPhone X. Immediately started looking for another Rokform case and I was not disappointed when receiving my new case. I run a Tool & Die/Machine Shop so I know when something is built the correct way. If a rugged case is what works for you all means get this case. The only ding I have on the case is the side buttons. They work just fine just not a lot of tactical feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Once you install this product, it is impossible to make wireless charging
customer_reviews.text: Once you install this product, it is impossible to make wireless charging Because the cover is relatively thick, it is not possible to pair the iPhone with the charging surface, so it is not possible to charge wirelessly, as this is not specified in the product specification (no proper disclosure requirement)
customer_reviews.author: A. Gutman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case, not easy to get off of mount.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case, but I still worry that I will break the grooves as it seems to get stuck on the mount. Gotta use some force to twist off the mount. I hope it gets a little easier to remove in time.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ok ig
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for 3 years and I’ve put it to the ultimate test. I’ve used it as a hammer,chopped onions with it,used it to clear light brush and even used it to stop a 50bmg round shot at me in Iraq. It has been sturdy case and most importantly...it has been a friend:)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just wish that it didn’t have the clip hole in it...
customer_reviews.author: Rd

customer_reviews.title: Why no plug?
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice but the product is misleading I bought the iPhone XS case for 39.00 with no plug. The other phones are advertised with a plug for the same price and now to buy a plug separately is 19.00 thats Ridiculous come with the plug.
customer_reviews.author: madison seeger

customer_reviews.title: The magnet in the case is extremely versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even use the car mount part all too much. Working in the hvac field and working on cars as a hobby, the high strength magnet is a must. I will probably never own an otter box case after buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The magnet works well and it's pretty sturdy. A little overpriced but so far it seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O.

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic phone case
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well constructed. Magnet is very strong and works well with my mob armor magnetic mount. Overall happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: The case along is very sturdy. However the magnet isn’t very strong to stay stuck to the tank.. on fwy it does slide.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It looks nice. The only thing I would say is that it exposes the camera and has no screen protection. But overall it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Eric Castelan

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Strong Magnet! Only drawback is sometimes people hear me muffled. (iPhone XS)
customer_reviews.author: cuahutemoc gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Drop proof trust me I do construction
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect protection, bevel around screen could be more prominent but so far no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Too Snug that it's not easy yo take out when you want to put phone on wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: Raima

customer_reviews.title: Side Buttons Are Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Bad fit. Extremely tight fit. Side buttons were impossible to press and use. I got the case because it seemed like an improvement on the old design were the molding eventually came off. This case seemed better built and the angled corners seemed like a good feature, unfortunately since the buttons were impossible to press I ended up ordering the another Rokform case but one with rounded corners.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Ty

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This case is solid! Very durable and inexpensive investment to take care of your phone. I had this on my previous phone too. I used it on my road bike and mountain bike. I wish I can afford a second mount so I don’t have to move my mount to which ride I’m doing. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jun @ RSM

customer_reviews.title: Required Case for Rokform Phone Mount
customer_reviews.text: This case is used with the Rokform Phone Mount for motorcycles, etc. Not much to say beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Code Slinger

customer_reviews.title: It’s what you need on your bike
customer_reviews.text: I ride a Harley and needed a phone case that was sturdy and could handle the vibrations. I’ve been using the case for 2 months and had it on several rides. It’s performed very well!
customer_reviews.author: Ricdav12

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a very quality case
customer_reviews.text: Great case and well made product. It just sucks that I can’t charge my iPhone X via wireless while the case is on.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

product_meta.title: Rokform - iPhone XS/X Magnetic Case with Twist Lock, Military Grade Rugged iPhone Case Series (Black), [iPhone X/XS] (303701P)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:[iPhone X/XS]Rokform Rugged for iPhone XS and iPhone X is the perfect case for anyone that wants military-grade protection and sleek style. Made with dual-compound materials, the Rugged has a tough polycarbonate outer shell and impact-resistant core. It's drop tested to six feet, so you don't have to worry about accidentally dropping your phone. Plus, the Rugged features Rokform's signature RokLock twist lock system and magnetic technology, which allow for instant mounting onto Rokform accessories, mounts, and almost any magnetic surface.
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC CASE: Includes powerful industrial-grade magnet built into iPhone XS/X Case. Sticks to ANY magnetic surface and will NOT affect Credit Cards, Wi-Fi, GPS, or Bluetooth.
TWIST LOCK: Use the built-in RokLock, which enables you to mount this iPhone XS/X Case to your motorcycle, UTV/ATV, bicycle or stroller. All Mounts Sold Separately.

CASE PROTECTION: Constructed of high-impact polycarbonate armor with reinforced corners designed to absorb shocks and drops. Our design provides a dual layer of protection that exceeds Military Grade Drop Test Standards, MIL-STD 801G-516. 6.
ROKFORM DESIGN: Designed in California, this light yet durable case was built to perfectly fit your smartphone and features a raised bezel to provide six-sided, 360-degree protection.
ROKFORM : We offer a 2-year on our entire catalog, along with 5-star customer support. If you have any issues with your purchase, please let us know, and we will fix it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
